item.description:
Szechuan Tokyo Restaurant features Szechuan Chinese Specialties and Japanese Delicacies from their Kitchen and Award-Winning Sushi Bar.

Szechuan Tokyo Restaurant is also famous for being the top presenter of live jazz music in an intimate supper-club setting, featuring a critically acclaimed lineup of talent for over 10 years. And so, we are going jazzy with Timmy Maia this time...smooth jazz!


Soulful Songster TIMMY MAIA returns for a Saturday Night Soiree! Showtime's 8:30 for an evening with this very popular vocalist -- Make sure you RSVP early!


Come join us for terrific jazz and great company. See you there!
BTW...we will be having dinner there before the show. Dinner at 7:00...show at 8:30. You can do either, or both!
item.name: Goin' Jazzy...Again. Timmy Maia @ SZECHUAN TOKYO
